channel.title: I can't find Client.Java
channel.description:
Well, I'm new to all this, and I had a few questions.
I can't find the client.java in my server folder. I used the testscape source and I want to change what it says, and add commands and stuff. Also I want to know how to make accounts admins and mods. Can I get any help please?

item.title: I can't find Client.Java
item.dc:creator: @faze1one faze1one
item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

[quote=“bily123, post:3, topic:353781”][quote author=Losernerd link=topic=450082.msg3301537#msg3301537 date=1281335950]
Well, I’m new to all this, and I had a few questions.

I can’t find the client.java in my server folder. I used the testscape source and I want to change what it says, and add commands and stuff. Also I want to know how to make accounts admins and mods. Can I get any help please?
[/quote]
if you can’t find the folder i highly doubt your oging to be able to make commands[/quote]

he conat do nuthing w\o the client file

Read full topic

item.title: I can't find Client.Java
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

[quote=“bily123, post:3, topic:353781”][quote author=Losernerd link=topic=450082.msg3301537#msg3301537 date=1281335950]
Well, I’m new to all this, and I had a few questions.

I can’t find the client.java in my server folder. I used the testscape source and I want to change what it says, and add commands and stuff. Also I want to know how to make accounts admins and mods. Can I get any help please?
[/quote]
if you can’t find the folder i highly doubt your oging to be able to make commands[/quote]

That was uncalled for.
On topic, Client.java is located in your Source folder in aphabettical order. It should just simply say Client. But, it is a Java file. (Meaning, it looks like a piece of notebook paper.) (DO NOT OPEN THE .CLASS ONE, {IT IS THE BLUE NOTEPAD ONE})

Read full topic

This goes in server help, i never heard of a source w\o client.java. And to make accs mods and admins, its in the char folder, look for the player, and change the playerRights to 1- mod 2-admin 3-owner

Read full topic
